TopicTitle: Has anyone put together a calendar?

Articles.Content: I assume that when you start a new game, that all the planets are at the same place for every one. My question is has anyone put together a calender. For example first Duna window is on Day X and then every Y days after that. Or maybe a calculator, if the target orbit is non curricular.

Try these:

http://alexmoon.github.io/ksp/

http://ksp.olex.biz/
And there was me thinking you were going to ask about using a bunch of screenshots for a calendar you could stick on the office wall. Jeb would be proud.
